<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>As bland and flavorless as the life of an Imperial stormtrooper, ration packs are a common item on smaller ships used to augment or replace actual galley fare. Each can be easily reconstituted into a full meal through built-in heat infusers and limited hydration. Most ships include emergency ration packs in case of disasters such as hard landings or engine failures, and while not all are actually made for the Imperial Army, most follow the same standard make. Understandably, ration packs are one-use items.  Models Include: Imperial Army Ration Packs.</description> <description_html><![CDATA[As bland and flavorless as the life of an Imperial stormtrooper, ration packs are a common item on smaller ships used to augment or replace actual galley fare. Each can be easily reconstituted into a full meal through built-in heat infusers and limited hydration. Most ships include emergency ration packs in case of disasters such as hard landings or engine failures, and while not all are actually made for the Imperial Army, most follow the same standard make. Understandably, ration packs are one-use items.
Models Include: Imperial Army Ration Packs.]]></description_html> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Ration Pack</name> <number>GEAR0001085</number> <price>5</price> <range/> <rarity>0</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_class_name/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:35:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f0a084b42f94a450e0f497eef699b6b3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 23:46:20</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
